about_the_game:
"Beyond the Red Door" is a gripping first-person horror experience that plunges you into a nightmare where reality and the unknown collide.

Seven years ago, a devastating car accident shattered your life—your wife was lost, and your daughter has remained in a coma ever since. Haunted by guilt and grief, you find yourself trapped in a terrifying dream, standing before a massive crimson door. A voice whispers from beyond—your daughter's soul is trapped inside.

One night, you awaken from a disturbing dream of a massive red door, only to find yourself somewhere else—a dark, twisted world beyond comprehension. You didn’t mean to enter, but now you’re trapped. A voice echoes in the void—your daughter’s soul is here, lost and waiting.

To save her, you must navigate the horrors of this nightmarish realm, unlocking its secrets while avoiding the shadows that lurk within. Armed with only a flashlight and your wits, you must survive and escape the nightmare before it consumes you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 (6GB) / AMD Radeon RX 580 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Not supported
  • Additional Notes: SSD is strongly recommended to reduce loading times. Headphones with surround sound recommended for immersive horror experience. Ray tracing enabled for high-end GPUs (optional setting).
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 12 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card with 3D audio
  • VR Support: Not supported
  • Additional Notes: SSD is strongly recommended to reduce loading times. Headphones with surround sound recommended for immersive horror experience. Ray tracing enabled for high-end GPUs (optional setting).
